code: import React from'react';import Table from'@mui/material/Table';import TableBody from'@mui/material/TableBody';import TableCell from'@mui/material/TableCell';import TableHead from'@mui/material/TableHead';import TableFooter from'@mui/material/TableFooter';import TableRow from'@mui/material/TableRow';import Paper from'@mui/material/Paper';import tabledata from'./helpTableData.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var HelpTable=function HelpTable(props){var helpid=props.id;if(!helpid){return;}else if(helpid.includes('date')){helpid='date';}else if(helpid==='sid'){helpid='sids';}else if(helpid==='name'){helpid='elems';}var helpdata=tabledata.hasOwnProperty(helpid)?tabledata[helpid]:tabledata.nohelp;var ncols=helpdata.hasOwnProperty("contents")?helpdata.contents[0].length:1;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paper,{elevation:1,variant:"helpPaper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{size:"small",children:[helpdata.hasOwnProperty("heads")&&helpdata.heads.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHead,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableRow,{children:helpdata.heads.map(function(cell,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:cell},i);})})}),helpdata.hasOwnProperty("contents")&&helpdata.contents.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:helpdata.contents.map(function(row,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableRow,{hover:true,children:row.map(function(cell,j){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{variant:cell.includes("subhead:")?"head":"body",colSpan:row.length===1?ncols:1,children:cell.replace("subhead:","")},j);})},i);})}),helpdata.hasOwnProperty('foots')&&helpdata.foots.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableFooter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableRow,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{colSpan:ncols,children:helpdata.foots})})})]})});};export default HelpTable;
